content.body: practitioners: do you expect/want `Error.prototype.stack` strings to chain together stacks from `.cause`? or do you only expect that chaining to happen in more "sophisticated" printing places like the DevTools console and console.log?

content.body: i feel like it's weird to have the `.stack` string automatically chase `.cause` chains because then you have to parse the string to figure out which is a particular error object's stack
